Detailed Description

Module for Unicode related classes and operations.

Function Documentation

bool chaos::uni::is_digit ( chaos::uint32  code_point)

Returns whether the given Unicode code point is a digit or not.

Example usage:

chaos::uni::UTF8String s( "5" );
chaos::uni::is_digit( s.get_code_point( 0 ) ); // returns: true
char* chaos::uni::utf8_to_utf16 ( const char *  data)

Converts the given c string of UTF-8 encoded data to a new c string of UTF-16 encoded data.

Warning
This operation allocates a new char array that must be deleted.
Exceptions
chaos::ex::ValueErrorIf the provided data is not UTF-8 encoded.
chaos::uni::UTF8String chaos::uni::join ( const std::vector< chaos::uni::UTF8String > &  components,
const chaos::uni::UTF8String &  separator 
)

Joins the given vector into a single chaos::uni::UTF8String.

The components of the vector will be concatenated together with the separator string between each component.

Example usage:

std::vector< chaos::uni::UTF8String > components;
components.push_back( "Hello" );
components.push_back( "World" );
chaos::uni::join( components, "_" ); returns: "Hello_World";
Parameters
componentsVector of string components to join together as a single string.
separatorchaos::uni::UTF8String to join each component together with.
Returns
New chaos::uni::UTF8String containing the results of the operation.
